name: OROBOROS (greasywhopper)
description:
game made using blueprints in UE4.

it is an endless game where the goal is not to die. Eat orbs to grow larger and avoid the lasers, and use portals. bounce orbs through the portals to make them worth more, at a cost that you now have to catch the moving orb in flight.

controls: 

Left Mouse Button to eat orbs, Right Mouse Button to go fast, ESC to pause.
